Chen Wei Zhu

Yet Another Legal Academic @ Birmingham Law School, UK

Chen Wei Zhu

  • Senior Lecturer (College of Arts and Law, University of Birmingham)
  • Yet Another Legal Academic (who uses Emacs… )

Research interest

  • Ambush Marketing and Image Rights
  • Law and Software

  • FOSS Authoring Tools for Legal Research

Teaching
